content: Feeling the grind this week? Well, feast your eyes on a selection of desks made from old cars. And if it's time for a well-deserved break, then take your pick from amazing subterranean hotels; they may be the safest place when a mass extinction event is on its way. Elsewhere, don't miss out on massive choppers, creative condom ads, tasty breakfast inspiration and much more...
title: 10 Coolest Links of the Week
author: Alice Lipscombe-Southwell
